values: "Honey, I love you but... I'm gay." [Laughter] "You are not." "Well, I was happy once." [More laughs] "Well, I do iron." "Hmmm... okay... I see your point."

During a recent discussion of Spencer's name being spelled with a 'c' instead of an 's' like the character played by Robert Urich in Spencer for Hire. Chris: "So, how are we spelling your name anyway?" Spence: "S-E-X-Y."

Hey Mom?
Yes.
Can I miss school on May 1st? [insert innocence here]
Why?
On that day Hispanic people all over the world will be united to protest the immigration laws in the U.S.   They're skipping work and school in protest. [sober expression]
Really?
Yes, really, Mom. [earnest delivery]
Well...  in that case... [hopeful look]
No.  Absolutely not.  You will NOT skip school to protest immigration laws or any other laws for that matter.
[sheepish grin] Yeah, I didn't think you'd let me.  I was all like 'Hey I want to protest!' and my Hispanic friends were like, 'but you're WHITE.'

Even the Hispanic friends knew it was a ridiculous request.

"Spencer, would you put in the DVD?"
Pause.
Sigh.

"Spencer, would you turn it up?"
Pause.
Sigh.

"Um, Spencer?
Pause.
"Would you go outside and wax the car?"

"AGGGGHHHHHH!!"

for the new dog.

Chris: "We could just name her 'bee-yatch'"
Spencer: "And we could change Sophie's name to 'my man.  Then, when the dog starts bugging Sophie, we could yell, 'get away from my man, beeyatch!"

Oh yes.  We're off to a fine start with names.

"JESUS CHRIST!!!  What THE FUCK was THAT??!!!!"
"Julie, Jesus isn't playing basketball in Greensboro tonight."

Pause.

"But if he was, I'm sure he'd be playing for Virginina..."
...how I know you're gay? Your mascot is a gay cavalier.
I discovered Mighty Goods and thought I would share...

1. I rub my feet together when I'm tired.

2. When I'm sick I wear my favorite soft shirt and watch Moonstruck.

3. In times of crisis, I seriously contemplate moving or going back to school or both - the more serious the crisis, the further along I get into the process.  To date, I have applied to 3 law schools.  

4. I sleep with 3 pillows.  Each is necessary for a different reason.

5. I sing in the car.  In broad daylight.  In traffic.  Barry Manilow.
